access.email_helper_text: It is possible to fill in several emails as a list
access.no_clearance_no_public_access: If you do not have clearance from the creator, the work cannot be made public available
access.only_private_is_available: Only private access is possible due to internal license

save_personal_access_error.duplicate_email: One or more emails already have access
save_personal_access_error.invalid_email: One or more emails are incorrectly typed
save_personal_access_error.network_error: Problem contacting the server, try again later

authority.empty_search_query: Must contain at least one letter or number
authority.not_possible_to_remove_warning: NB! It is not possible to remove an authority after it has been selected

confirm_before_publishing: If you find incorrect data you can go back and edit the form.
confirm_before_publishing_title: Please reread before you publish the resource.

dashboard.close_popover: Press escape to close this box
dashboard.enter_tags: Search and select tag for filtering
dashboard.login_reminder: Log in to have access to more resources from your institution.

error.401_page: You are not authorized for this
error.403_page: You must be logged in for using this feature
error.500_page: Whoops, something went wrong. Try again later
error.generic: Whoops, something went wrong. Try again later

explanation_text.contributor_helper_text1: Others who have contributed to the resource but does not need to be credited in future usage of the resource
explanation_text.contributor_helper_text2: It is not possible to change the name of the contributor after it has been verified
explanation_text.creator_helper_example: Examples: lecturers, teachers, authors og creators of the resource can be submitted here
explanation_text.creator_helper_text1: The person, company, or organization who is the rights holder
explanation_text.creator_helper_text2: As a Curator, you have the opportunity to verify creators. It is not possible to change the name of the creator after it has been verified
explanation_text.description_helper_example1: A short video about the sympathetic nervous system's components and how it acts
explanation_text.description_helper_example2: Presentation about keyboard navigation and universal access. The lecture is aimed at frontend developers and addresses WCAG 2.1
explanation_text.description_helper_example3: Illustration sketch of the body's internal organs. The illustration shows the position of the organs in relation to each other
explanation_text.description_helper_text1: Provide a short description about your resource content
explanation_text.file_title_helper_example1: "Orange blossoms on tree" is a better file title than "img_23434.jpg"
explanation_text.file_title_helper_example2: The filename "thesis.pdf" can be used as file title
explanation_text.file_title_helper_text: File title can be different from file name
explanation_text.resource_type_example1: Example: If the resource is a video recording of a presentation, set "video" as type
explanation_text.resource_type_example2: If none of the types fit, select "document"
explanation_text.resource_type_helper_text: Set the resource type according to the main resource content
explanation_text.search_input_helper_text: Special characters *, ?, and ~ are supported. More information about search terms is available at
explanation_text.tags_helper_text: Tags describes the contents of a resource. A single tag may consist of one or multiple words, for example "optical illusion"
explanation_text.tags_helper_text_edit_resource1: Write your first tag and then press enter and then type your next tag. It is possible to add or remove tags after publication of your resource
explanation_text.tags_helper_text_edit_resource2: Quality tags increases the chance that others will find and use your resource
explanation_text.tags_helper_text_example: Example: A resource with title "The Sympathetic Nervous System" can have "syk130", "nursery", "healthcare subject", "nervous system", and "health" as tags
explanation_text.title_helper_text: Useful titles help others to find your resource

feedback.form_errors: There are errors in the form. They have to be corrected before the resource can be published
feedback.valid_url: Input must be a valid URL
feedback.published_warning: The resource is published. Changes to any field will be saved and published instantly.

illustration_alts_tags.browsing_resource: A woman is browsing for resources

commercial_options.yes: Yes, the material can be used for commercial purposes
commercial_options.NC: No, others cannot use the material for commercial purposes

license.cannot_change_on_published: The license and restrictions cannot be changed since the resource is published.

modify_and_build_options.non_destructive: No, others can only use the material in it's original form
modify_and_build_options.yes: Yes, others can modify and build upon your material
modify_and_build_options.share_alike: Yes, but they have to use the same license as this resource
modify_and_build_options.share_alike_warning: Be aware that this might cause complications for usage of your resource

part_description.bi: For internal uses at BI only
part_description.cannot_change_license: You cannot change the license after publication
part_description.more_information: You can read more about individual licenses by selecting them
part_description.nd: ND - No derivatives or adaptations permitted
part_description.need_to_select_license: You must choose a license so that others knows your usage restrictions.
part_description.ntnu: for internal uses at NTNU only
part_description.only_for_internal_usage: Can only be used at your institution
part_description.sa: SA - Share adaptations under the same terms
part_description.zero: Zero - This work has been marked as dedicated to the public domain

questions.commercial: Can others use the resource for commercial purposes?
questions.contains_other_peoples_work: Does the resource contain other's work?
questions.modify_and_build: Can others modify and build upon your resource?
questions.special_needs: Do you have special needs for restricting usage of the resource?
questions.usage_cleared_with_owner: Is the usage cleared with the owner?

bi-opphaver-bi.title: Yes, with internal BI-license
bi-opphaver-bi.important_notice: The resource should only be available for BI and published with internal BI-license

creative_commons.title: Yes, with Creative Commons license
creative_commons.important_notice: If the source content's license is CC BY-SA or CC BY-NC, you must provide the same license

no_clearance.title: No
no_clearance.important_notice: Copyright legislation prevents you from publishing other peoples work. We recommend that you gain license from the owner

ntnu-internt.title: Yes, with internal NTNU-license
ntnu-internt.important_notice: The resource should only be available for NTNU and published with internal NTNU-license

license.radio_information: Answer the questions below to receive a license suggestion, or pick a license directly from the drop-down menu below

restriction_options.bi-opphaver-bi: Yes, it can only be used internally at BI
restriction_options.CC_BY_4_0: No, I want the resource to be used and shared
restriction_options.CC_BY-NC-SA_4_0: Yes, it contains material with license CC BY-NC-SA
restriction_options.CC_BY-SA_4_0: Yes, it contains material with license CC BY-SA
restriction_options.ntnu-internt: Yes, it can only be used internally at NTNU
restriction_options.yes: Yes, I want to apply restrictions on the use of the resource

resource.add_tags: Add 4-6 tags. Press enter for adding more tags.
resource.delete_resource_confirmation: Are you really sure you want to delete
resource.delete_resource_description: This will permanently delete the resource and the resource cannot be restored

additional_files.additional_files_description: In case you need more files in order to make the resource complete. For instance if you want both a Word and a PDF document, or multiple language files, Latex files, formulas etc.
additional_files.additional_files_warning: Do not upload series nor collections of resources as additional files

preview.file_to_big: The file is too big for preview
preview.preview_is_not_supported_for_file_format: Preview is not supported for this file format

resource.start_with_uploading_file: Upload file if the resource is to be published on the Internet for the first time

search_tricks.asterisk1: Asterisk (*) is used as wildcard to replace one or more characters in the search term. t*ck will match "tick", "tock", and "trick"
search_tricks.does_not_support: It is not possible to use +, AND, or OR as syntax
search_tricks.field_hits: The following fields are used by the search text
search_tricks.find_tricks: Here you find tips for how to search for resources. Navigate to
search_tricks.question_mark1: Question mark (?) is used as single wildcard to replace one character in the search term
search_tricks.tilde1: Tilde (~) discovers terms that is similar to a specified term without necessarily being an exact match
search_tricks.tilde3: will match terms like "roam" "roams", "foam", & "foams". An optional distance parameter specifies the maximum number of edits allowed, between 0 and 2, defaulting to 2. For example
search_tricks.tilde5: will match terms like "roams" & "foam" - but not "foams"

sitemap.usage_tip: Scroll down the page, or use the browser's built in search to find what you are looking for

thumbnail.revert_thumbnail: Delete uploaded thumbnail and revert to suggested thumbnail
